item.title: Legend of Slime Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Legend of Slime is a cute, simple, yet addictive idle RPG with a bunch of mechanics that will grab your attention for hours, maybe even days. In many games, slimes are the weakest enemies, being the initial ones, but Legend of Slime breaks all the standards. Here, the slime plays the protagonist's role, fighting against evil people who rise up on the way. Throughout the game, you'll need to level up your slime, get new weapons, armor, and even companions, but all of this requires Gems, the local premium currency. By redeeming Legend of Slime codes, you'll get a bunch of Gems, which will be enough to properly equip your character, especially if you're a beginner.

Updated October 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Be sure to check this guide regularly, as we update it with new codes whenever they become available. Stay tuned for further updates.

All Legend of Slime Codes

Even without an excessive amount of Gems, the game is easy and fast, but getting new cool equipment or companions is also nice, especially since it gives a good advantages. Manually accumulating currency can be a bit time-consuming, so the best method is to redeem Legend of Slime codes, which will bring you tons of Gems in seconds.

Working Legend of Slime Codes

  • WELCOME - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Gems.
  • URBACK - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Gems.

Expired Legend of Slime Codes

  • SLIMESLIKEHOTNOODLES
  • APPQUANTUM
  • 1eb9d966a2d286c2
  • 9b6ce1893791c34b
  • D220D576590742F4
  • 3402E62AB77AC379
  • CUTDZ
  • BSMAS
  • EB95EE09FE225B15
  • F6C7C63C07DDDE3A
  • 1A6D214B3D87F9F6
  • 019707E987C74A42
  • 2EA55FFA9561F786
  • F6C7C63C07DDDE3A
  • 37E28C5D19DEBB43
  • 419F0576C9248129
  • SWALLOW_SLIME
  • MARRIED_SLIME_0601
  • GOLDENWEEK
  • LOS_0327
  • LEGENDSLIME2023

How to Redeem Codes for Legend of Slime

Redemption of Legend of Slime codes is easy and quick but will be available only after completing a short tutorial. If you have never redeemed Legend of Slime codes before, follow the instructions below to understand how to do it:

  • Go to the Home screen.
  • Pay attention to the upper right corner of the screen. There will be a button with three dashes and dots. Click on it.
  • This will open a drop-down menu. Here, find and interact with the Settings button. It's the second one on the list.
  • In the Settings menu, pay attention to the bottom section. There will be a button labeled Coupon. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu, which has only three options, an input field, and two buttons: Cancel and OK. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the OK button to submit the reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen listing the rewards you have received.

Legend of Slime is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Pizzeria Tycoon 2 offers players to run their own pizzeria. However, it is not easy at all, as your restaurant will initially not even have walls and tables. Therefore, in the early stages, you need to focus on earning Cash. And using Pizzeria Tycoon 2 codes is the best way to do this.

As befits Roblox code, they will provide you with various useful rewards, including Cash boosters. With their help, players will earn several times more money even at the starting stages, so you should not skip them.

Updated October 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: New codes have arrived and have been added to the list. Check them out and grab them while they’re still active.

All Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes

Working Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes

  • 10MVisits - Redeem this code to get Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • 100KFollowers - Redeem this code to get Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • 60KLikes - Redeem this code to get Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • FollowTijoro - Redeem this code to get Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • 1KLikes - Redeem this code to get 5 Minutes Cash Boost
  • 1KCCU - Redeem this code to get 15 Minutes Cash Boost
  • 350KVisits - Redeem this code to get 5 Minutes Cash Boost

Expired Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes

There are no expired codes in Pizzeria Tycoon 2 . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Pizzeria Tycoon 2 is one of the classic representatives of the tycoon games. In it, you will have to serve guests and sell pizza to earn money. Of course, the more you invest in upgrades, the more you automate passive income. But first, players will have to do everything manually. To speed up this process, you will need Pizzeria Tycoon 2 codes.

As we said, each of these codes will reward you with useful free goodies, such as Cash or boosters. The latter are especially useful, as they help to significantly increase income, regardless of the stage of development of your restaurant. However, we do not recommend that you delay their use, since each code has a set expiration date.

How to Redeem Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes

Fortunately, using Pizzeria Tycoon 2 codes is no more difficult than in other Roblox experiences. For your convenience, you can follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch the Pizzeria Tycoon 2 title.
  • Then, click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code, and click Redeem to get the well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Pizzeria Tycoon 2 Codes

As you can see, these Roblox codes can help you significantly speed up your progress in Pizzeria Tycoon 2 . In addition, the developers quite often add free goodies. So, you can find new codes and news on the developer's official social media pages:

  • Red Tree Tycoons Roblox group
  • Tijoro X page

item.title: One Piece: Every Power-Up Unlocked By Sanji Yet to Be Featured in Games
item.description:
Spoilers for Whole Cake Island Arc and beyond

“Black Leg” Vinsmoke Sanji is one of the fiercest members of the Straw Hat Pirates. Like his crew mates, Sanji has not only grown emotionally and mentally over the course of One Piece , but expanded his power levels to extremes with the introduction of Haki and Diable Jambe. However, not every one of Sanji’s powers has been showcased in One Piece ’s many video game adaptations.

With the Wano Arc of One Piece officially over in both manga and anime, it wouldn’t be surprising to see aspects of Sanji’s powers from the arc finally make it into a video game adaptation. The same can be said for the Whole Cake Island Arc, which featured Sanji as one of the central protagonists. Both arcs see Sanji broadening his power set with a new dangerous power up introduced and the expansion of one of his signature moves.

While Sanji has been included in several video games outside the One Piece franchise, like Jump Force and even Roblox’s Square Piece , this article focuses on his power set within mainline One Piece games.

The Enhancements of Germa 66's Raid Suits

In the midst of the Zou and Whole Cake Island arcs, it is revealed that Sanji’s origins are not from the East Blue, but rather from the North. Born to King Vinsmoke Judge, Sanji is the third son of Judge and prince of Germa. He and his siblings were experimented on in the womb to remain cold emotionless killers. Though all members of the Vinsmoke family are immensely powerful on their own, as commanders of super group Germa 66, the family uses special suits to enhance their powers.

Raid suits in O ne Piece have some general abilities: the suits are fire-resistant, the capes of the suits are bullet-proof, and the suit’s boots have accelerators on the heels and flotation devices in the soles. They're also intended to enhance the user's natural powers and abilities; Sanji is shown easily crushing the canister of a raid suit easily with one stomp, though it is well-known that his feet are his most powerful weapons.

Sanji’s powers were thought to have been dormant both by his family, as shown by the immense childhood abuse they inflicted upon him in response, and by himself. Despite his supposed lack of powers, a raid suit was made by Germa 66 for Sanji. He eventually comes across the raid suit canister and disavows using it until he reaches Wano.

What Soba Mask Offered to Sanji

Donning his black raid suit, Sanji notices that it seems to reawaken the dormant experimentation that Judge had afflicted on him and his mother in utero. Sanji is now able to fly and strengthen his kicks with the propelled boots of the suit. Like the other suit wearers, Sanji gains a unique enhancement from the suit: invisibility.

Sanji uses his newfound invisibility to surprise attack his opponents and later to sneak out Nami, Robin, and Shinobu and to rescue Kozuki Momonosuke during the raid on Onigashima. Sanji quickly recognizes that the suit is similar to a fictionalized version of Germa 66 found in the comic series “Sora, Warrior of the Sea”. Rather than naming his raid suit form Stealth Black, after his comic counterpart, Sanji rejects this name and calls himself 0-Soba Mask. He eventually destroys the raid suit canister, once again rejecting Germa and his birth family.

Soba Mask's Possible Future in One Piece Games

Though the raid suit is featured as wearable DLC by Luffy in One Piece: World Seeker , he gains no additional powers by wearing it. This seems to be consistent with mainline One Piece games released after the conclusion of Whole Cake Island. It should be noted that Soba Mask is a playable character in One Piece: Bounty Rush , a mobile 4v4 action game, but this seems to be the only appearance of him as a playable character.

Soba Mask still has yet to be featured in a One Piece mainline game at the same level as One Piece: World Seeker or One Piece Odyssey , leaving this part of Sanji’s history extremely underutilized. The raid suit’s invisibility could act as an incredible ultimate ability in combat games or could be a useful recon skill in games more closely resembling One Piece Odyssey .

Ifrit Jambe Burns Bright

The powers of Germa 66 aren’t the only aspects of Sanji’s power set that have yet to be adapted to video games. An expansion of one of Sanji’s signature moves has yet to be seen in video games. Though Sanji’s “Diable Jambe” is used quite frequently both in mainline One Piece games and in games featuring him outside the franchise, his “Ifrit Jambe” has yet to receive the same treatment.

After the raid suit awakened Sanji’s inert abilities, Sanji accepted these new abilities he had gained while destroying the suit itself. By combining his newfound powers with his old ones, Sanji developed new techniques from his Black Leg style with names that still maintain his flair. Ifrit Jambe burns brighter and hotter than Diable Jambe. By combining his exoskeleton with Armament Haki, Sanji’s legs are able to withstand the hotter blue flames of Ifrit Jambe compared to the fiery red of Diamble Jambe. His new enhanced speed and the weight behind his kicks also increases the power of Ifrit Jambe.

Though it may not be as flashy as Germa 66’s raid suit, Ifrit Jambe should be a power set used in One Piece mainline games going forward, not just because this power set is more powerful than Sanji’s previous, but because Sanji himself will likely use this power set more often than Diable Jambe. These newfound powers represent a shift in Sanji as a character, and video game adaptations should take note of this shift and respect it.

One Piece remains far from over and, therefore, the growth Sanji’s power set may receive still has yet to be seen. Nevertheless, video game adaptations of the franchise should heed these changes and adapt alongside the franchise, especially with one of its most powerful characters.

item.title: Roblox: RNG Combat Simulator Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
As the name suggests, RNG Combat Simulator combines certain types of Roblox games as RNG and Simulators. Therefore, players must roll various Auras to increase stats and fight other players for Stars. But, since at first, you will only come across the most common Auras, it is quite difficult to progress. To fix this, you should use RNG Combat Simulator codes.

With the help of codes, players can get free goodies in this Roblox experience in just a couple of clicks. And, some of them will reward you with many valuable Stars. But, if you do not hurry, the codes will expire, and their rewards will no longer be available.

Updated October 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We’ve added a new code to this guide for you to enjoy. Be sure to redeem it as soon as you can.

All RNG Combat Simulator Codes

Working RNG Combat Simulator Codes

  • omggems - Redeem this code to get 150 Gems (NEW)
  • rngcombatsim - Redeem this code to get 500 Stars
  • starterstars - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Stars
  • summeregg - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems
  • ghaztguystudios - Redeem this code to get 500 Stars

Expired RNG Combat Simulator Codes

There are no expired codes in RNG Combat Simulator . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Most of the time, you will be rolling Auras in RNG Combat Simulator . The rarer Auras you get, the more your stats will increase. But in addition to this, players will need Pets that increase multipliers. They can be obtained in exchange for Stars. However, the latter is only earned by battling in the style of Mountain Dawn on a separate island. Luckily, there is a way to get Stars from the very beginning much easier, namely RNG Combat Simulator codes.

Each code offers you a different number of Stars, from 50 to 1,500. So, even a few of them will help you get rare pets before your first battle. However, the codes are active for a limited time. So, you should use them while they are still valid.

How to Redeem RNG Combat Simulator Codes

Using RNG Combat Simulator codes is as easy as in other Roblox experiences. Just a few clicks separate you from free goodies. For convenience, we recommend following these simple steps to redeem codes:

  • First, launch RNG Combat Simulator .
  • Next, open Settings by clicking on the corresponding button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, scroll down and enter the code. It is important to note that this experience is case-sensitive, so all codes must be lowercase.
  • Finally, click the Redeem button to receive your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More RNG Combat Simulator Codes

To get more RNG Combat Simulator codes, players should bookmark this article. We will update it over time, as is the case with our other Roblox codes guides. In addition, you can visit the developers' official pages to get first-hand news:

  • GhaztGuy Studios X page

item.title: New Steam Horror Game Has 'Overwhelmingly Positive' Reviews
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Psychological horror game Mouthwashing debuts to "Overwhelmingly Positive" reviews on Steam.
  • Publisher CRITICAL REFLEX has a track record of producing highly-rated games.
  • Mouthwashing has a small 10% discount until October 10.

Mouthwashing , the brand-new horror game from developer Wrong Organ and publisher CRITICAL REFLEX, has debuted to "Overwhelmingly Positive" reviews on Steam. The game first launched on Steam on September 26, but Mouthwashing has already had a big impact on gamers.

Developer by Wrong Organ, Mouthwashing is a psychological first-person horror game that follows a crew of a shipwrecked space freighter. The game's description paints it best, claiming that players can "Follow the lives of the crew as they weather starvation, isolation, and each other," promising immersive storytelling and psychological scares. It does all of this with a unique PSX-esque graphics style, giving the game a unique nostalgic feel. In the wake of Mouthwashing 's release, players have taken to Steam's review section to show their appreciation for the game.

Almost two weeks on from its launch, Mouthwashing on Steam has already been given the label of "Overwhelmingly Positive" reviews. Games must garner at least 500 reviews before they can be awarded this title, with a minimum of 95% of them being positive. At the time of writing, Mouthwashing has over 1,500 positive reviews, a huge achievement for a niche horror game. Currently, Mouthwashing doesn't have enough critic reviews to have a Metascore on review aggregate site Metacritic. However, it does have a user score of 9.0, indicating it's one of the highest-rated games of 2024 at the moment.

Mouthwashing Has "Overwhelmingly Positive" Reviews on Steam

Mouthwashing continues a trend of positive reviews for both its developer and publisher. Wrong Organ has one previous title under its belt, 2022's How Fish is Made , which also received "Overwhelmingly Positive" Steam reviews. Meanwhile, CRITICAL REFLEX has never published a game that received less than "Mostly Positive" reviews, a record that improves to "Very Positive" when excluding its first two games. It's great to see smaller studios creating unique experiences that take chances with their mechanics. In the case of Mouthwashing , Wrong Organ may have produced one of the best psychological horror games around.

Mouthwashing is currently available at a 10% discount on Steam, giving early adopters a chance to pick up the game for $11.69 rather than the usual $12.99 price. This deal is available until October 10, so any gamers interested still have a few days to take advantage of Mouthwashing 's lower price. It could be the perfect time to pick up another spooky game to play this Halloween. If the "Overwhelmingly Positive" reviews are any indication, it's well worth a try.
